title: Simple illustrations — Awesome vector illustrations for your next project
author: Ramy Wafaa
content:
“ Hello Everyone 👋 This is Ramy the founder of Getillustrations Bundle. We created this pack to help designers and developers who are looking for smart, attractive and easy to use illustrations for their projects such as: 💻 App screens 📄 Articles 🖥 Landing pages 📩 Emails 📊 Presentations The initial project launch delivers 217 unique illustrations with 300 more coming as a free update to this pack 😉 Feel free to share your thoughts and check the entire collection of illustrations on our product page, there's much more than what we can display. If you have ideas that we didn't draw yet just share it and we'll add it in the next update 🚀 🙏 Thanks, Ramy, Krishna and the creative team of getillustrations.com ”
– Ramy Wafaa

Discussion | Link

title: Know Your Data — Understand datasets & improve data quality, by Google PAIR
author: Aditya
content:
“ Hey PH friends! Happy to hunt Google PAIR (People + AI Research) team's new endeavour, Know Your Data: a new tool to explore datasets. I came across this while reading their launch article on Medium (https://medium.com/people-ai-research/know-your-data-a-new-tool-to-explore-datasets-ba45b7665695). Some of the main highlights are: ✔️ Better understand datasets ✔️ Improve data quality ✔️ Mitigate bias issues ✔️ 71 image datasets via TensorFlow Datasets catalogue Try it for yourself → http://knowyourdata.withgoogle.com ”
– Aditya

Discussion | Link

– Chris Messina

Discussion | Link

title: We Ynspire — Chat with other students on campus
author: Fatoumata D.
content:
“ Are you looking for a student room app where you can meet students and chat with them? Do you want to download Student Desk App and Student Wellbeing App where you can post messages and questions and other will be able to help you? You just got the right place! We developed a Student Desk App named We Ynspire: Study Buddy, Meet Students App - College Campus Chat (College Group chat) where you can join the conversation with other students, you can make relationship with international students. Introduction to We Ynspire: Student Desk App - School & University Inventory, Student Wellbeing First of all, we warmly welcome all the users to our one and only student room app named “We Ynspire: College Campus Chat, Meet Students”. Here you can post your queries with international students and you can create college campus chat. Other students will be able to see your post. All the users of this Study Buddy - Meet Students App are able to like and comment on your post to solve your queries or they can share your post with other international students to their college group chat to get the solution of your problem. Key Features of We Ynspire: Study Buddy, Meet Students App - College Campus Chat (College Group chat) ✪ Chat with your friends and other international students in this Student Room App ✪ Get homework and other tasks from your College Campus Chat (College Group chat) ✪ Find new friends and learn from international students (Student Wellbeing App) ✪ Find jobs relevant to your skills in this Student Desk App (School & University Inventory) ✪ Sharpen your debating skills in this Student Room App by commenting on their posts ✪ Study Buddy - Meet Students App helps you to get confidential advices from expert international students ✪ Get wide variety of topics, Affordable Higher Education, Job Board, College Campus Chat, and much more ✪ Student Room App helps you to send and receive private messages from international students or from friends With We Ynspire: Study Buddy, Meet Students App - College Campus Chat (College Group chat) it is easier to start conversation with anyone who has joined this Student Desk App - School & University Inventory App. New to “We Ynspire: Student Room App - Affordable Higher Education, International Students” Joining “We Ynspire: College Campus Chat, Meet Students App” is very easy process. You can use your favorite social network to sign-up to this Student Room App. Already a member of We Ynspire: Study Buddy, Meet Students App - College Campus Chat (College Group chat) If you’re already a member of “We Ynspire: College Campus Chat, Meet Students App”, then you can simply login with your username or password or you can directly login with your favorite social media platform. So, what are you waiting for? Download We Ynspire: Student Desk App - School & University Inventory, Student Wellbeing now and enjoy chatting, learning, and finding jobs in your relevant fields with the help of this Student Room App. Sharing is Caring!! Share We Ynspire: Study Buddy, Meet Students App - College Campus Chat (College Group chat) App with your friends, colleagues, and family members. Let them be a part of this Student Room App where they can learn and they can get answers to their queries. ”
– Fatoumata D.

Discussion | Link

author: Alex Madrzyk
content:
“ Brendan is a rising Notion creator who has gotten significant attention on Reddit and Substack for his elegant templates and useful Notion productivity hacks. I'm excited to hunt this product because I can see the value it can provide to anyone interested in diving into the world of Notion. Awesome work @brendanshih! 🎉 ”
– Alex Madrzyk

Discussion | Link

title: Songcraft.io — A platform for songwriters to write, organize & collaborate.
author: Dré Labre
content:
“ After years of organizing, moving and reorganizing songs in backpack, evernote, onenote, google docs, notion ... i'm settling on this product. I'm delighted with the songwriter-centric nature of this app. Beyond crafting and collaborating with others, there are a suite of useful tools like tuners and dictionaries to help in all aspects of songwriting. ”
– Dré Labre

Discussion | Link

title: Chili Search — The better search for WordPress
author: Ali Jafari
content:
“ Chili Search is there to provide the best search experience for WordPress websites because we believe your website deserves a better UX. We are constantly working on it and your comment will help us to make our plugin more amazing. ”
– Ali Jafari

title: Typocard — Easily create the perfect quote cards to share online
author: Andre Bass
content:
“ Now with Twitter no longer cropping images, this tool can be used for content on almost every social platform, Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, Snapchat, etc. Enjoy! ”
– Andre Bass

Discussion | Link

title: Funky Monkey NFTs — 1,000 limited-edition monkey NFTs that help save rainforests
author: Funky Monkeys
content:
“ Hello PH, we wanted to experiment with creating NFTs that positively impact our planet. Collecting and trading cute NFTs is great, but what if your NFTs could also help preserve natural rainforests? The Funky Monkeys smart contract is programmed so that when you adopt a monkey, 50% of that Ether goes into the wallet of The Rainforest Foundation US - a non-profit organization focused on tackling major challenges like: deforestation, the climate crisis, and human rights violations. We had a lot of fun building this project! ”
– Funky Monkeys

Discussion | Link

creator: Stefan Wolpers
title: Food for Agile Thought #293: Success Metrics, Maker-User-Gap, Strategy and Outcomes, Stakeholder Map Templates
content:encoded:
TL; DR: Success Metrics, Maker-User-Gap—Food for Agile Thought #293

Welcome to the 293rd edition of the Food for Agile Thought newsletter, shared with 31,307 peers. This week, we delve into why picking success metrics is so challenging yet critical, and Henrik Kniberg shares some vital insights after years of working with Spotify, LEGO, and Minecraft development. Also, we point at how sociotechnical architecture and systems thinking are key to enabling product thinking in organizations.

We then share an eight-step strategy workshop; we understand why ‘going deep’ is Stripe’s core product principle, and we wonder why some product managers hold on to timeline-based planning while product roadmaps have evolved so rapidly in recent years.

Lastly, we analyze the idea of ‘autonomy’ in the workplace, particularly regarding two challenges: the air sandwich and politics.

Did you miss the previous Food for Agile Thought’s issue #292?

🗞 Shall I notify you about articles like this one? Awesome! You can sign up here for the ‘Food for Agile Thought’ newsletter and join 31,000-plus other subscribers.

🎓 Join Stefan in one of his upcoming Professional Scrum training classes!

Join more than 225 peers from May 27-29, 2021, for the Virtual Agile Camp Berlin 2021, a live virtual Barcamp using open space technology principles and practices.

🏆 The Tip of the Week: The Bottom of Agile

Curtis Stanier (via Medium): Measuring Impact — Picking the success metrics in Product

Curtis Stanier delves into why picking the right metric to track success is both important and challenging.

Source: Medium: Measuring Impact — Picking the success metrics in Product

Author: Curtis Stanier

➿ Agile & Scrum

Henrik Kniberg (via Crisp): 📺 Minimize the gap between Maker and User

Henrik Kniberg shares some critical insights after years of working with Spotify, LEGO, and Minecraft development.

Source: Crisp: 📺 Minimize the gap between Maker and User

Author: Henrik Kniberg

Eduardo da Silva: Sociotechnical Architecture as Enabler of Product Thinking

Eduardo da Silva's article points at how sociotechnical architecture and systems thinking is key to enabling product thinking in organizations.

Source: Sociotechnical Architecture as Enabler of Product Thinking

Author: Eduardo da Silva

Jason Yip (via Medium): Why aligned autonomy is an ongoing struggle

Jason Yip delves into the idea of ‘autonomy’ in the workplace, particularly regarding two challenges: the air sandwich and politics.

Source: Medium: Why aligned autonomy is an ongoing struggle

Author: Jason Yip

🎓 🖥 🇩🇪 Professional Scrum Master Training w/ PSM I Certificate — Live Virtual Class: June 15-18, 2021

Discover Scrum’s four success principles in this official Scrum.org Professional Scrum Master training class, leading to and including the industry-recognized PSM I certification. The training is designed as a live virtual class of four sessions from 9:00 am to 1:00 pm CEST and will be offered in German.

Learn more: 🖥 🇩🇪 Professional Scrum Master Training w/ PSM I Certificate — Live Virtual Class: June 15-18, 2021.

Kundenstimmen: “The class with Stefan was very well structured, delivering a helpful hands-on approach to all the Scrum basics. He managed to cover participants with different levels of expertise and from various fields easily and delivered knew knowledge and value to all of them from my point of view. The culture during these four days was excellent, so that everyone felt capable to speak up. Very much worth the invested time and money!” (Link.)

👉 From time to time, we can offer last-minute seats for training classes at cost to individuals who do not have access to a corporate training budget. If you like to be notified about these opportunities, please register here.

🎯 Product

Charles Lambdin: Strategy and Outcomes

Charles Lambdin shares his approach to running an eight-step strategy workshop.

Source: Strategy and Outcomes

Author: Charles Lambdin

Ken Norton: Building Products at Stripe

Ken Norton interviews Michael Siliski on Stripe’s ‘going deep’ as its core product principle.

Source: Building Products at Stripe

Author: Ken Norton

andrea saez (via Medium): Why are product managers still using a timeline?

Andrea Saez wonders why some product managers hold on to timeline-based planning while product roadmaps have evolved so rapidly in recent years.

Source: Medium: Why are product managers still using a timeline?

Author: andrea saez

📯 Three Wide-Spread Stakeholder Failures in 6:05 Minutes—Making Your Scrum Work #8

There are plenty of Scrum stakeholder failures. Given that Scrum is a framework with a precise and concise yet short “manual,” this effect should not surprise anyone. While the Scrum Guide makes numerous references to stakeholders in Scrum, stakeholders themselves are no official role (accountability), no matter their crucial contribution to a Scrum team’s overall success.

Explore with me three widespread examples of how stakeholders fail their Scrum teams in three short video clips, totaling 6 minutes and 5 seconds.

Learn more: Three Wide-Spread Stakeholder Failures in 6:05 Minutes—Making Your Scrum Work #8.

🛠 Tools & Measuring

(via Strategyzer): Why do corporations fail to hear disruption signals?

Strategyzer makes their Disruption Risk Assessment available so that you determine how healthy or at risk your business model is.

Source: Strategyzer: Why do corporations fail to hear disruption signals?

Shane Drumm: 13 Free Stakeholder Map Template in Word, PPT, Google & PDF

Shane Drumm lists 13 templates to support your learning effort to understand the importance of your organization’s different stakeholders.

Source: 13 Free Stakeholder Map Template in Word, PPT, Google & PDF

Author: Shane Drumm

📅 Scrum Training Classes, Workshops, and Events

Date Class and Language City Price
🖥 💯 🇬🇧 May 27-29, 2021 GUARANTEED: Virtual Agile Camp Berlin 2021 Live Virtual Conference €29 incl. 19% VAT
🖥 💯 🇩🇪 June 15-18, 2021 GUARANTEED: Professional Scrum Master Training (PSM I; German; Live Virtual Class) Live Virtual Class €1.199 incl. 19% VAT
🖥 💯 🇩🇪 July 6-9, 2021 GUARANTEED: Professional Scrum Product Owner Training (PSPO I; German; Live Virtual Class) Live Virtual Class €1.199 incl. 19% VAT
🖥 🇬🇧 July 13-16, 2021 Professional Scrum Master Training (PSM I; English; Live Virtual Class) Live Virtual Class €1.199 incl. 19% VAT
🖥 🇩🇪 August 17-20, 2021 Professional Scrum Master Training (PSM I; German; Live Virtual Class) Live Virtual Class €1.199 incl. 19% VAT
🖥 🇬🇧 August 24-27, 2021 Advanced Professional Scrum Master Online Training w/ PSM II Certificate Live Virtual Class €1.199 incl. 19% VAT
🖥 🇩🇪 Aug 31-Sept 3, 2021 Professional Agile Leadership Essentials Training (PAL-E; German; Live Virtual Class) Live Virtual Class €1.199 incl. 19% VAT
🖥 🇩🇪 September 21-24, 2021 Professional Scrum Product Owner Training (PSPO I; German; Live Virtual Class) Live Virtual Class €1.199 incl. 19% VAT

See all upcoming classes here.

You can book your seat for the training directly by following the corresponding links to the ticket shop. If the procurement process of your organization requires a different purchasing process, please contact Berlin Product People GmbH directly.

📺 Join 2,800-plus Agile Peers on Youtube

Now available on the Age-of-Product Youtube channel:

  • 🆕 Hands-on Agile #30: Making Your Scrum Work—The Product Backlog Forensic Analysis.
  • Scrum Guide 2020: Eight Remarkable Changes — Hands-on Agile #28.
  • Remote Agile (1) Replay: Practices and Tools for Scrum Masters, Agile Coaches, and Product Owners.

✋ Do Not Miss Out and Learn more about Success Metrics — Join the 9,000-plus Strong ‘Hands-on Agile’ Slack Community

I invite you to join the “Hands-on Agile” Slack Community and enjoy the benefits of a fast-growing, vibrant community of agile practitioners from around the world.

If you like to join all you have to do now is provide your credentials via this Google form, and I will sign you up. By the way, it’s free.

🗞️ Last Week’s Food for Agile Thought Edition

Read more: Food for Agile Thought #292: The Bottom of Agile, Efficiency is the Enemy, Nijute to Solve Impossible Problems, The Velocity Forecasting Spreadsheet.

The post Food for Agile Thought #293: Success Metrics, Maker-User-Gap, Strategy and Outcomes, Stakeholder Map Templates appeared first on Age-of-Product.

title: Honua — Rate photos to create your personal tour guide
author: Jaysquared
content:
“ Whenever I wanted to leave for a day trip on the weekend, we were going to the same places, as nobody wanted to read travel guides. Honua is the tour guide app for the Instagram generation. Just look at photos to find interesting places to visit. Initially only a few regions are available. But I also included world wide "bucket list" locations. More regions will be added gradually and I also eventually plan to include the option to upload your own photos to share with the community. I would love to hear your thoughts. Thanks! ”
– Jaysquared

Discussion | Link

title: Can You Notify — Find out when your favorite web dev features, are usable
author: Mars H
content: Discussion | Link

title: Comet — openAPI editor for nerds
author: wwayne
content:
“ Hello everyone. Comet is an open-sourced, web-based editor for openAPI. I made it mainly because I didn't find a good alternative for the swagger editor but I still use openAPI a lot in my daily works. So... if you have the same issue, just give it a go and all suggestions are welcomed :) ”
– wwayne

Discussion | Link

title: BeMyJourney — Plan Italy trip in 3 steps, download itinerary for free
author: Andrea Martina Specchio
content:
“ Having visited over 60 countries worldwide – mostly secluded like Galapagos, Svalbard and Ladakh – I have always been driven by the pursuit of authenticity and unique experiences. Inspired by my travel style, for a long time foreign friends have asked me for suggestions and recommendations when planning their journeys in Italy, my home country. Motivated by these conversations, I decided to take the plunge and share these special places and experiences on Be MyJourney ”
– Andrea Martina Specchio

Discussion | Link

title: Spawn — 500GB+ database copies for dev and CI in under 30 seconds
author: Christopher Heppell
content:
“ Hi Product Hunt! We built Spawn after having our own frustrations with trying to get production-like database copies to support our development and CI workflows. 🐢 Stop waiting for database restores Waiting hours for the restore of a database backup to a dev box for isolated copies always took forever. And using a shared instance risked trampling over other colleagues changes. We'd had enough of the database being the thing that slowed us down. So we started building Spawn as a way to solve that in a way that feels natural for developers. 🚀 Capture a database state, and make instant copies Spawn lets you create data images which represent a known state of a database. This can be carefully curated yourself, or the result of restoring a database backup or running a series of scripts. Once you have a data image, you can create data containers from it which are provisioned instantly - regardless of the actual size of the original data image. Each data container is completely isolated, so each of your team mates can have their own dedicated data container for their own work. 🔄 Undo costly mistakes instantly You can save the state of your data container at any point, so risky changes or accidents no longer require you to wait hours to restore yet another database backup. Just run "spawnctl reset data-container" and you're back to your last save point. ⏩ Parallelise tests with independent copies Spin up independent data containers for each of your integration test suites and start running your tests in parallel without worrying about tests interfering with one another. 💻 Built by developers, for developers Everything is driven via a single clientside commandline "spawnctl" since Spawn itself is a hosted service. No painful installations of database engines, or contention for compute on your local machine. 📣 Get started now for free 📣 Spawn is available to use right now. Head on over to https://spawn.cc and follow the link to "Get started" and you'll be up and running straight away. We're still in the early stages so we're really excited to welcome any and all feedback you might have. Let us know what you think! ”
– Christopher Heppell

Discussion | Link
contentSnippet:
Stop waiting for database restores

Waiting hours for the restore of a database backup to a dev box for isolated copies always took forever. And using a shared instance risked trampling over other colleagues changes.

We'd had enough of the database being the thing that slowed us down. So we started building Spawn as a way to solve that in a way that feels natural for developers.

🚀 Capture a database state, and make instant copies

Spawn lets you create data images which represent a known state of a database. This can be carefully curated yourself, or the result of restoring a database backup or running a series of scripts.

Once you have a data image, you can create data containers from it which are provisioned instantly - regardless of the actual size of the original data image. Each data container is completely isolated, so each of your team mates can have their own dedicated data container for their own work.

🔄  Undo costly mistakes instantly

You can save the state of your data container at any point, so risky changes or accidents no longer require you to wait hours to restore yet another database backup. Just run "spawnctl reset data-container" and you're back to your last save point.

⏩  Parallelise tests with independent copies

Spin up independent data containers for each of your integration test suites and start running your tests in parallel without worrying about tests interfering with one another.

💻  Built by developers, for developers

Everything is driven via a single clientside commandline "spawnctl" since Spawn itself is a hosted service. No painful installations of database engines, or contention for compute on your local machine.

📣  Get started now for free 📣

Spawn is available to use right now. Head on over to https://spawn.cc and follow the link to "Get started" and you'll be up and running straight away. 

We're still in the early stages so we're really excited to welcome any and all feedback you might have. Let us know what you think!
        ”
        
Discussion

        Link

title: Gå ur Svenska Kyrkan — Lower your tax online, in 2 minutes
author: Matt Phelps
content:
“ Niche Mates make niche products. This one is REALLY niche. What does "Gå ur svenska kyrkan" mean? ----------------------------------------------- It's Swedish for "leave the swedish church". What's the problem you're solving? ----------------------------------------------- Swedish citizens born before 1996 automatically become members of the Swedish church- religious or not. It wouldn't matter... if you didn't have to pay part of your income to them! Depending on where you live, you pay between 1-2% of your salary to the Swedish church. You're allowed to leave, but they don't make it easy. It's a great business they've got going: - Acquisition costs are 0 - you become a member automatically upon birth - Most members are unaware that they are paying - it's not talked about a lot - Recurring revenue - a 1-2% royalty on productivity of millions of people... - It's hard to opt-out - why would they make it easy to stop giving them money? The church asks you to print out a form (that's hard to find), sign with a blue pen (wtf?) and send to the congregation you belong to (which one do I belong to??). They make it hard. We make it easy. Why did we build this? ----------------------------------------------- Leaving the church is free, but it's a lot of work to figure out how to do it. Over 20k people search every month about this, with little information to find. There's a few scammy sites out there that "help". They're often based in tax havens, charge WAY too much and don't deliver what they promise. We figured we could make things easy for the customer and make a small margin in the process. ► We Need YOU 🤜 💥 🤛 ----------------------------------------------- I'd love some feedback on the layout of the site. Maybe you could translate it to learn more about how it works? Thanks for checking out Gå ur Svenska Kyrkan =) ”
– Matt Phelps

Discussion | Link

title: FromNotion — Beautiful one-page sites on Notion in minutes
author: Alexey Shashkov
content:
“ Hi Product Hunt! 👋 Thank you Kat Manalac @katmanalac for the mindset of «Launch again and again». 🙌 Thank you Eric Migicovsky @ericmigi for the Inspiration. I've been closely following your launch of Beeper and have learned a lot. 🚀 We are excited to share the FromNotion with the world. Notion user?👩‍💻 Indie maker?🧑‍💻 Startup founder?👨‍💻 🎉 FromNotion generates simple, responsive, one-page sites on Notion. And with a no-code Style Editor, you can customize your website's appearance. Use Notion like your website editor and content management system. Use FromNotion to generate your websites from your Notion pages and customize the appearance. A few quick examples I created on Notion with FromNotion: Company page: https://customdesk.fromnotion.com Landing page: https://beeper.fromnotion.com Personal page: https://shashkoff.com We hope you like it! We would love to hear your feedback and will be hanging out here to answer your questions! Try it fo free: https://fromnotion.com Current Functionality: Currently, FromNotion is on the MVP stage. This is just a very early-stage project. FromNotion makes it easy to: – Free Subdomains (ex customdesk.fromnotion.com) – Your Custom Domain (ex. shashkoff.com) – Turning Notion Callouts into Buttons – Custom Fonts (Google Fonts) – Font Size – Alignment of text and buttons – SEO (meta title and meta description) – Favicon – 4 Notion Templates – 4 Style Presets What’s Next: – Multi-page websites – Visual Builder – New Templates – Built-in Integrations (Zapier, Integromat, GoogleAnalytics, Mailchimp, Hotjar, Crisp, Stripe, Paypal, Gumroad, and more) – Custom Code (to integrate web analytics, live chats, web-forms, and more) – WebForms (send data to Notion and any service e.g Airtable and more) 🚀FromNotion will grow into the easiest way to create websites and will get its many more innovative features. Follow for Updates: – Twitter - get support & inspiration here. – Sign Up in FromNotion and you'll get a weekly newsletter with Product updates, features, guides, and more. We would love to hear your feedback and suggestions! What are you missing today? What features do you wish existed? Share your thoughts and help us build the best way to build websites that you love! ✌️ 🙌🙂Thanks for your attention and support! ”
– Alexey Shashkov

title: Clubhouse Links by Linktree — Customize and share details about Clubhouse events and rooms
author: Alex Zaccaria
content:
“ Hey Product Hunt! In a little over a year, Clubhouse has become one of the most popular social media platforms in the world. Similar to Linktree, Clubhouse began as a free, purpose-driven tool aimed at helping people create their own space to share ideas, innovate, and connect. It’s only fitting to be rolling out Linktree’s latest link-detection features that gives users the ability to customize and share details about events and rooms on their Linktree page. This ultimately will increase your Clubhouse engagement and build your following directly from Linktree. We're excited to rollout 5 new features: - Direct your followers to your latest Clubhouse Event so visitors can see what topics you’ll discuss, who is hosting and what time it starts! - Promote your impromptu Clubhouse Room via your Linktree - Grow your club through sending your visitors to your Club with a Club Link that displays important info like club interests and follower count - Promote your profile by adding a link to your profile - Grow your following with a Clubhouse Social Icon For now, PRO users can utilize the scheduling feature to set the start and end time of Clubhouse links so you can have the link disappear as the event is done. For all users, we will automatically convert the date and time of your event to the visitor's timezone. Linktree’s Clubhouse links are available to all our users - free and PRO. Check out https://linktr.ee/LTClubhouse and don’t forget to join our Linktree club on Clubhouse to hear about new product features, what’s trending on social media and tips on how to optimise your online presence. If you have any questions about the product, feel free to post them below and myself and the team will get back to you! ”
– Alex Zaccaria

title: DataSource.ai 2.0 — Community-funded data science tournaments
author: Daniel Morales
content:
“ Hello hunters! We're launching version 2.0 of the data science competitions. Here the competitions are quite different. - It's a community-funded data science tournament. - We run short-term tournaments - The competitions go through playoffs, with: quarterfinals, semifinals, and finals. - Each of this stages has different dataset releases, under the same ML problem. This faithfully simulates the input of new real data, and the improvement of the model (via re-training) based on them. It also keeps the excitement high, as no one has their position completely won! - In the playoffs you will compete head-to-head against other randomly picked data scientist (in the quarterfinals), and then the best of each bracket will compete against each other. - All backers/participants win something very valuable: the winner's ML models in a Jupyter Notebook - We choose exciting and unique ML problems to solve - We guarantee the transparency of the competition by giving the winner's models to all participants and publishing the actual values (of the datasets) at the end of each stage - The prize pool will be distributed as follows: 50% to the winner, 30% to the second place and 20% to the third place. What do you think of the idea? We love feedback and would be happy to hear from you. Ready to get an adrenaline rush and show what you know? Go ahead and join us! ”
– Daniel Morales

Discussion | Link

author: Jan Oberhauser
content:
“ I am very excited to finally launch the Notion integration for n8n today. Looking forward to seeing all the amazing things the community will build with it! For the people that do not know n8n: n8n is an extendable workflow automation tool that enables you to connect anything to everything via its open, fair-code model. You can either use our hosted version: https://n8n.cloud (30-day free trial) or you can self-host it totally for free: http://n8n.io / https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n Your feedback is always highly appreciated! Thanks a lot!! ”
– Jan Oberhauser

title: Jewelry CAD Market — Marketplace for jewelery CAD files
author: Tevar Johnson
content:
“ Our website provides some of the most popular items bought from jewelry stores and more are being added daily! Each purchase comes with a step by step guide on how to create it. This is a no experience needed process. Once you have a CAD you just need to email it to a caster to cast it into the metal of your choice (ex. 14kt gold). Once its finished you then need to take it to a polisher to finish it. The cost for doing all of this independently is 100% cheaper than buying from jewelry store. Another reason to independently make your jewelry is you receive better quality jewelry because your selecting the exact type of material you want behind the scenes rather than trusting a jeweler to give you a specific type of diamonds or metal. ”
– Tevar Johnson

title: Post Uploader for Instagram — Upload post to Instagram from your PC
author: Thomas MacGibbon
content:
“ Functionality: ⭐️ Upload Instagram photos and videos. Extension support all popular photo and video formats - MP4, MOV, JPEG, JPG, PNG, SVG, GIF. ⭐️ Delete posts. Remove unnecessary posts from your account; ⭐️ Rotate, move, crop picture while posting; Straighten image with the adjust tool; ⭐️ Add post caption (while creating); ⭐️ Tag people (if you're not able to tag someone, they may have changed who can tag them in their privacy settings); ⭐️ Add post location (while creating). 💁 How to use it? 1. Install Post uploader for Instagram™️. 2. Once the extension is installed, "+" icon will be added to the Instagram menu navigation bar. 3. Click on the icon. You will see the modal where you can select videos or images which you want to upload. 4. Modify your images (not videos). Once you've taken or uploaded a photo, you can add effects or filters into your image - rotating, scaling, cropping (according to social platform crop sizes), moving. 6. Provide post caption (optional). 7. Tag peoples on the post (optional). Click a person in the photo and start typing their name. Select the full name of the person you want to tag when it appears. 8. Post and add locations. Start typing location name and select the location in the suggestions list. 8. Click Submit button. Wait a few seconds and your post will be successfully uploaded! Additional: 👍 Removing post. Hover on the post and you will see the extension icon at the top-left side of the post. Click on the icon and the post (removing process start working) will be deleted. Feature functionality: 💪 Editing and removing location of an existing Instagram post; 💪 Adding extra large videos, more than Instagram 60s time limit; 💪 Uploading stories from web Instagram; 💪 Adding hashtags into your posts that have already been posted; 💪 Tagging photos that have already been posted; 💪 Uploading Videos to IGTV; 💪 Add a caption to a photo or video you've already shared, or edit or delete the caption you originally included. Important note! Instagram™ is a trademark of Instagram Inc., registered in the US and other countries. This is an independent project developed independently and not affiliated with Instagram ™ or Instagram Inc. ”
– Thomas MacGibbon
